name: Spin Wheel – Interactive spinning wheel that offers coupons
author: bdthemes

sections.description:
The Spin Wheel plugin provides an interactive way to engage your visitors by offering them a chance to spin a wheel and win coupons or other rewards. This plugin is designed to increase user engagement and boost conversions by providing a fun and rewarding experience.

Key Features:
* Interactive spinning wheel to engage visitors
* Customizable rewards and coupons
* Responsive design that works seamlessly on both desktop and mobile devices
* Easy to use and configure
* Supports all WordPress blocks

When placing blocks on a page, the best region to place them in for desktop displays and mobile displays is not always the same. For instance, having a lead generation form at the top of the sidebar is great for a desktop display, but ends up at the bottom of the page on a mobile display. The Spin Wheel plugin ensures that your content is displayed optimally on all devices.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/spin-wheel directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to the ‘Spin Wheel’ settings page to configure your spinning wheel and rewards.
sections.faq:
Does it support all blocks?

Yes, it supports all WordPress blocks without any issues.

Can I customize the rewards?

Yes, you can easily customize the rewards and coupons offered by the spinning wheel through the plugin settings.

Is the plugin responsive?

Yes, the Spin Wheel plugin is designed to work seamlessly on both desktop and mobile devices.

short_description: The Spin Wheel plugin allows you to engage your visitors with an interactive spinning wheel that offers coupons and other rewards.
